content.question: What is said about the emergence of the butterfly?

choices.label: Saori’s sibling shared the moment with her.
Saori stayed up late to watch it.
Saori’s classmates came to watch it.

content.answer: Saori stayed up late to watch it.

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meanings of a text.
